Report on SSD-Analysis
==========================

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```


## Aggregated data:

```{r agg_data}
kable(get_cdata(), digits = 4, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r settings_plot}
print(settings_plot())
```



## Fitted SSD Model:

* Distribution: `r input$model`
* Fitting method: `r fit()$method`
* Bootstrap method: `r input$boot_method`
* No. boot samples: `r input$nboot`

```{r model_table}
kable(results_table(), digits = 4)
```


```{r model_plot}
print(results_plot())
```
